channel.title: Anyway to cheat on exam w/o getting caught?
channel.description: There's an exam coming up and I'm in college, and I lack sufficient knowledge about anything on it haha. Is there anyway to cheat on it w/o getting caught?

item.title: Anyway to cheat on exam w/o getting caught?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Noodlebib is a very good tool to use to organize your notes, and it is also good to work on essays. The web site isn’t called nooblebib though, just go to noodletools.com, I am pretty sure they also have tuts on how to use the site correctly. Good luck with your test’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyway to cheat on exam w/o getting caught?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Cheating, or being lazy itself can both ruin your life. Trust me, I cheated in 5-7th grade, and sure, I was ahead 2 grades in english, but my math skills were about 2 grades below, because of cheating. Now that im entering college, I will be getting some tutoring in college, costing me about $200 a month. Please, if you are smart, start studying, or get a tutor. Sure, you may have bad memory, but you would be amazed at what can happen if you study.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyway to cheat on exam w/o getting caught?

item.title: Anyway to cheat on exam w/o getting caught?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Mr. Despair:

I did study. Also Spades, cheating on one test won’t ruin my life :\

Well yes it can, one test could be your degree or another year or so in classes, you should never have to cheat to gain an advantage in the real world it will never work out for you. You should just try to find out the things you can’t remember and study those more then what you already know, I have never study for a test in my life and my lowest test score was a 79, I have failed a test but that was because I wasn’t at school to learn the stuff. A good tool to use would be noodlebib I use it for notes and stuff, its easy to learn and free. I should also point out if you have a bad memory you should try to relax a little like meditate or even try out yoga, I know your going to say “WTF YOU THINK I AM A HOMO OR SOMETHING?”. Those are both very good ways to get your mind on track.

Read full topic
